subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chan Ho Park signed a one-year, $600,000 contract Friday with the Mets, joining a logjam of what will now be no fewer than nine pitchers competing for three open slots in the starting rotation.
snippet: Chan Ho Park signed a one-year, $600,000 contract Friday with the Mets, joining a logjam of what will now be no fewer than nine pitchers competing for three open slots in the starting rotation.
